summary: Relating to land use and historic preservation; amending Chapters 22.901T, 23.66, 25.12, 25.16, 25.20, 25.22 and 25.24 of the Seattle Municipal Code to clarify the process for certificates of approval for preliminary and subsequent design phases for Landmark properties and for properties in the Ballard Avenue Landmark District, the Columbia City Landmark District, the Harvard-Belmont Landmark District, the International Special Review District, and the Pioneer Square Preservation District; and, to add a preliminary Certificate of Approval process for the Pike Place Market Historical District.
